title: Black salamander (Hunter)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The black salamander is a salamander that players can capture with the Hunter skill at level 67 or above, granting 319.2 Hunter experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Black salamander (Hunter)
This article is about the Hunter creature. For the weapon, see Black salamander.
Black Salamander
Released21 November 2006 (Update)
Combat level67
MembersYes
LocationLevel 20 Wilderness
ExamineSlightly slimy and somewhat menacing.
Advanced data
NPC ID2905

The black salamander is a salamander that players can capture with the Hunter skill at level 67 or above, granting 319.2 Hunter experience.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Hunter info
  • 3 Hunting technique
    • 3.1 Multiple traps
  • 4 Uses
  • 5 Changes
  • 6 References

The chance of a successful catch is approximately 56% beginning at level 67, and 83% at level 99.[1]

Hunting technique[edit | edit source]

The hunting technique is the same as for other salamanders. Players must bring a rope and small fishing net for each net trap they plan to set up. Clicking on a young tree will set the trap. Players can use the same rope and net over and over to catch multiple creatures.

Multiple traps[edit | edit source]

Net trapping can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum amount of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

Compared to hunting other salamanders, an extra trap may be set while hunting black salamanders, since they are located in the Wilderness.

Traps
1 2
20 3
40 4
60 5
80 6

Uses[edit | edit source]

The black salamander is a two handed weapon. It requires a level of 70 Ranged, Magic and Attack to wield. To be operated, the black salamander requires its requisite fuel, harralander tar.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 May 2014
(update)
  • There is now 6 trees for trapping black salamanders and they've been rearranged in one group near the western body of lava.
  • The catching experience has been increased by 5% from 304 to 319.2 and the spawns have been relocated nearer to the trees.
